column2: "<%me>. Welcome back. Wow, it's like you're an old hand at this."
"But don't let your guard down. One stupid mistake and you'll be back to being called Newbie again."
"That probably won't happen, though, at least based on what I've seen so far. But you never know."
"Now then, I look forward to working with you in the future, <%me>!!"
